## hpr1857 :: Adventures In Coffee

 
CPrompts French Press: https://www.amazon.com/Bodum-Chambord-French-Coffee-Chrome/dp/B00008XEWG

Grocer that has some great coffee: https://www.thefreshmarket.com/

The only creamer that will go in CPrompt's coffee: https://www.califiafarms.com/products/coffee-creamer/
